phrases: We come from a planet called Earth, and in no way do we mean you any-
I do not want to hear anything you invaders have to say to us!
W- w- wait just a minute, would you?
There is nothing sinister about us, I tell you!
You talk too much for men!
You are not popular with the girls, so-
Stop standing around and do something!
What did you do that for!?
I- I really will kill you.
Zeshin, let us hurry and kill them.
These guys have to be Freeza's men.
W- we have to kill them, huh?
We have gone into a meteor swarm!
Hey, keep an eye on these guys!
If they try anything funny, shoot them right there!
I have not even stuck you yet.
My, my, Goku is positively hopeless over this sort of thing.
I told you, I have not stuck you yet.
For someone who is always doing push-ups and sit-ups,
what are you so upset over something as small as this for?
Compared to the sufferin' Gohan went through, that pain should be nothing at all.
I am going to go pace a hundred times in front of the shrine for Gohan- chan's sake.
Any ship that goes into a meteor swarm like this will not last long,
no matter how tough it is!
If we do not hurry, we will not be spared, either!
But that is why we cannot just leave these needy people like this...
Who are you calling needy people!?
Geez, you two are just too nice to others...
What kind of piloting is that!?
I cannot stand to watch this!
I am a pro at this sort of thing, after all.
W- we do not need your help!
Letting me do this is better than getting everyone killed, right?
Let us see... this and this controls the ascent, and this is left and right.
Which one is the speed control?
You do not want to die, do you!?
T- the keys on the left side.
Looks like we somehow managed to pull through, huh?
Do not you trust us yet?
How can we ever trust you!?
Your pals are the ones who destroyed our planet, after all!
What do you mean, our pals?
You guys are Freeza's men, are not you?
These kids still seem to have us all wrong.
We do not have anything wrong!
We were convinced when we saw that barbaric power you have!
I will admit that those two are barbarians,
but I am a sincere person, who loves peace and justice.
How can we believe what you are saying!?
Guys, it is okay for you to put your guns down.
Their pals are the ones who killed our moms and dads!
If they were Freeza's men, they would not have saved us.
They would have just suddenly come attacking us, and have killed us all.
and killed Dad and Mom without saying anything, did not they!?
You have got a nice look in your eyes.
Then again, those guys sound just like Saiyans, huh?
Say, by any chance, did the guys that attacked you have tails?
No, they did not have those.
Then they were not Saiyans, huh?
Which would mean that there are other bad folks out here in space.
So, what happened to your planet?
Our planet was peaceful, and a very easy place to live.
Those guys appeared before us without any warning.
They said they were going to deliver our world to Freeza- sama,
and that we should be thankful.
And then they suddenly started killing our dads and moms like they were worms.
They were going to kill all the people who were on the planet,
and turn it over to Freeza!
I am surprised you guys survived.
The adults who realized what Freeza's scheme was had us escape in spaceships.
But all of the other spaceships were chased down by Freeza, and shot down!
So this mirror-clad spaceship is the only one that survived.
I see, so the mirrors reflect outer space.
That explains why we could not see the shape of your ship, either.
So where are you guys going now?
Yeah, there is a planet where our dads used to travel to on business long ago.
We are sure that they will take us in.
We will get to that planet, no matter how many years it takes.
We have lost quite a bit of time, so we need to hurry.
Oh, that is okay, is not it?
Planet Namek is not going anywhere.
Are you guys going to Planet Namek?
We passed it about two weeks ago.
If you go straight in the direction KS-162, there should be quite a shortcut.
Okay, we will hurry on, too!
Take direction KS-162 and head to Planet Namek.
That is a bit of a relief, huh?
Oh, I am just worried about the other bad aliens those kids talked about.
But they were not the Saiyans, right?
However, the Saiyans did have allies.
They have got nothing to do with us.
Well, I am going to bed.
However, Kuririn's concerns were by no means off the mark.
Eighteen days after Vegeta left Earth...
I- it is an older model.
We did not get any word that he was returning.
Could something have happened to him?
Hey, this is the control room!
Fall out to greet him at once!
There is just one pod, all right.
H- hey, his life signs are awfully low.
He is using the life-support equipment!
Hurry and take him to the treatment center!
B- Bulma- san, has something happened to cause this shaking!?
You guys make light of outer space,
so that is why you are so surprised by something like this.
This is a shortcut, so it is going to be a little bumpy.
How can she sleep through a situation like this?
I did not think that you would try anything like this!
You are a student of that Old Man Turtle, too, after all!
We have arrived at Planet Namek!
It is only been about ten days.
That is what a shortcut will do for you.
Bulma and the others had arrived in no time.
But was this really Planet Namek?
